House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00036
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REDUCING THE RATES OF INCOME TAX IMPOSED ON CORPORATIONS IN THE PHILIPPINES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8424, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997, AS AMENDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Lowers the corporate tax rates imposed on corporations by two percent (2%) per year for the next five (5) years from its effectivity and settle at a flat rate of twenty percent (20%).
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, ARTHUR C.
